project.name: Case Study Inventory Management
project.description: You have been hired by a small grocery store to develop a program that will help them manage their inventory and calculate the total cost of a customer's purchase. The grocery store sells different types of items, including fruits, vegetables, meat, and canned goods. The store needs a program that will allow them to add and remove items from their inventory, track the number of items sold, and calculate the total cost of a customer's purchase.
